Posts.Content: Oct 27, 2010 04:37AM NadineK420 wrote: Hi , I just joined today and am amazed at all the support I am reading. I  had a masectomy on Aug 24, with removal of a 5 cm tumor, triple negative, with 1/10 lymph nodes affected. I stfarted  my first Adrio/ cytoxin treatment 4 wks ago getting them every 2 weeks. I am slated to start taxol or taxere following this treatment for 12 . How are you doing? After 2 treatments I am o.k. comsidering. My question to you is I amstill unsure of my exact staging? When I ask myoncologist his answer is IIB or III A  O.K. which is it? Maybe you could shed some light please?
Posts.Title: August 2010...anyone starting chemo besides me?! 1WonderWoman 1WonderWoman
